text: The Marion County Herald is a weekly community newspaper in Jefferson, Texas. It was founded by employees of another newspaper, the Jefferson Jimplecute, who left in a dispute over pay. The first issue came out on June 19, 2015. The paper was distributed free of charge initially but restricted to paying readers starting with the third edition. It is available either in printed form or by online subscription. The paper's focus is on local news in Marion County, Texas. The paper is located at 115 N. Polk ST., Jefferson, TX 75657 and can be reached via phone at 903-472-5082 or via their website http://www.marioncountyherald.com. ==References== Category:Newspapers published in Texas
title: Marion County Herald
